about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure as a fearless pirate captain in this captivating strategy role playing game based on "Into the Breach" and "Go". Navigate the treacherous seas, assemble a formidable crew and set sail to collect precious treasures in the name of the empire. But beware, for the ocean is envious of those who hoard her riches, and the terrifying denizens of the deep will stop at nothing to claim what's rightfully theirs.


Select your leader from a cast of diverse and skilled pirate captains, each with their own unique abilities, shaping your journey on the high seas.


Recruit your loyal crew, each member contributing their expertise and abilities. Form a close-knit team ready to face the challenges of the deep.


Confront terrifying denizens of the ocean's depths, employing strategic tactics and clever maneuvers. Strategically surround your monstrous foes, showcasing your mettle in fierce confrontations.


Collect precious booty and uncover hidden riches, making each successful quest a step closer to claiming the glorious treasure that legends are made of!

name: Sunken Stones Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Requires 720p or higher resolution and outputs 16:9 aspect only, letterboxed if necessary.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A puzzle strategy game with roguelike elements! Become a fearless pirate captain, assemble your crew, and battle monstrous foes.
